It is very interesting to compare the statistics (from Yahoo) for the gaming stocks that come up to compare to PENN. Pull up CZR, WYNN, MGM, and DKNG. Check out the P/E ratio's, both trailing and forward. Also earning, price/book ratios, price to sales, enterprise value/revenue. Look at the earnings estimates for the last 4 quarters and how PENN beat 3 out of 4 times. None of the others beat 3/4 of the time.If any/all of those other stocks deserve a rally, then PENN absolutely does as well. I think it is just a matter of time before what is obvious to me becomes increasingly apparent to the gaming sector investment market. I think it is time to buy more. I think there will be a run up into earnings.
